Motivation: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Demotivation: If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world.

Motivation: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Demotivation: You must have been born on a highway because that's where most accidents happen.

Motivation: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Demotivation: I'd like to see things from your perspective, but I can't seem to get my head that far up my rear end.

Motivation: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Demotivation: If you were any less intelligent, we'd have to water you twice a week.

Motivation: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Demotivation: If you were a vegetable, you'd be a 'cute-cumber'.

Motivation: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Demotivation: I'm jealous of all the people who haven't met you.

Motivation: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Demotivation: If ignorance is bliss, you must be the happiest person on the planet.

Motivation: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Demotivation: I'm not saying you're stupid; you just have bad luck when it comes to thinking.

Motivation: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Demotivation: I'd challenge you to a battle of wits, but I see you came unarmed.

Motivation: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Demotivation: If there were a comedy club for failures, you'd be the headliner.
